DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate non-inferior efficacy Adapalene 0.1 % / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5 % Gel compare Clindamycin 1 % / Benzoyl Peroxide 5 % Gel Subjects acne vulgaris 12-week treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fixed Combination Adapalene 0.1 % / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5 % Gel Treatment Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Male female Subjects race , age 12 35 year inclusive , acne vulgaris , meet specific inclusion/exclusion criterion . Main inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female Subjects race , age 12 35 year inclusive , facial acne vulgaris , 2 . Subjects minimum 20 inflammatory lesion ( papule pustule ) face , 3 . Subjects minimum 30 maximum 100 noninflammatory lesion ( open comedo close comedo ) face , exclude nose . Main exclusion criterion : 1 . Subjects acne cystic lesion , 2 . Subjects acne conglobate , acne fulminancy , secondary acne ( chloracne , druginduced acne , etc . ) .
